channel.title: Doors, dummies,
channel.description:
Alright guys, I got three questions.
1. How do I make so I can train against npc, like when I attack a goblin it gives xp.
2. How do I make the dummies so they dont work, like i hit a dummy once and im alredy lvl 120 something -.-
3. How do I make it so the doors can close and open.
If anyone can answer all of the questions for me. It would be appreciated. Thanks in advance ! ;D
